definition: to write on the blackboard/writing on the blackboard
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: Various styles ask for different designs.
sentences.chinese: 不同文體的板書設計各不相同。

sentences.english: Take Good Notes. Try to write down everything that instructor puts on board.
sentences.chinese: 試着寫下講師在黑板上板書的。

sentences.english: Boy, my handwriting is atrocious, isn't it?
sentences.chinese: 同學們，我的板書可能不太正確對不對？

sentences.english: She writes beautifully on the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 上課時，她能寫一手優美的板書。

sentences.english: What are their presents? Look and say.
sentences.chinese: 複習已學過的禮物的名稱並板書。

sentences.english: And I wish I'd made my boards a little bit better.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我的板書做的更好一點。

sentences.english: Blackboard writing is a kind of way regularly used in classroom teaching .
sentences.chinese: 板書是課堂教學中經常使用的一種手段。

sentences.english: Let's write some key words of the answers on the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 師生共同尋找答案中的關鍵詞並板書在黑板上。

sentences.english: Listen to the tape again, follow the conversation.
sentences.chinese: 再聽一遍錄音，看板書關鍵詞。

sentences.english: Very good! Now listen again and answer the questions.
sentences.chinese: 板書問題，讓學生再聽一次錄音，聽完回答。

sentences.english: Let's draw a circle on a piece of paper.
sentences.chinese: 板書，教書在一張白紙上畫圓示範。

sentences.english: Listen to the tape. Answer the questions on the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 老師放錄音a，聽一遍，回答問題，板書呈現關鍵詞。

sentences.english: Listen to the tape, answer the questions on the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 聽錄音，回答問題，板書關鍵詞。

definition: full of youthful vigor (idiom)/in the prime of youth
to have no sense of shame/brazen
lit. view a text and interpret (idiom); to interpret word by word without understanding the meaning/a far-fetched interpretation
World Games/abbr. for 世界運動會|世界运动会[Shi4 jie4 Yun4 dong4 hui4]
hard to tell if it's real or sham
